email.subject: Welcome to Hacker Wars
email.body:
Hi there #PLAYERNAME#,
I'm John Tovar, the head administrator of Hacker Wars, I'm contacting you as I'd like to personally welcome you to the competition!
So, Welcome #PLAYERNAME# to Hacker Wars!
Getting setup with our servers shouldn't be too difficult for a Hacker such as yourself. I've provided you with IP address to our new and exclusive Hacker chat system. Here you will find the latest news as well as discussions between the other competitors.
You will also find attached a login to our main Hub server where you will be able to see who you are up against next and start a new game with another competitor.
I think that covers everything, I will be watching out for you in the games!
Good luck!
- John Tovar CEO at Hacker Wars

attachments.note: Go Ahead and take a look at the discussion forum. There are some new messages talking about the competition. Once you've read in on the latest news, go ahead and connect to the Main Hub. Your first opponent will undoubtebly already be waiting for you there.
